name: Visible Mending 101
description:
You can bring something you’d like to mend, or practice on fabric scraps as we explore simple techniques like darning, and patchwork.

Visible mending shows that repairing is not just practical, but beautiful. It's a way to care for our clothes, extend their life, and add a touch of personality and colour along the way.

All materials will be provided, but feel free to bring your own garment to work on.

name: Yoga + sound bowl experience at the Van Gogh Immersive exhibition
description:
Yoga + Guided Breathing + Sound Bowls + Journaling… in an art masterpiece. 🎨✨

You don’t want to miss this one-of-a-kind experience happening right here in Bangalore!

And the best part : you will get your own Wiselife yoga mat at the event !!

Date: 23rd August (Saturday)

Time: 8:30 am

Location: The Van Gogh Immersive Exhibition, Bhartiya Mall of Bangalore

Movement, mindfulness, and creativity — all surrounded by the magic of Van Gogh’s art.

location.name: Bhartiya Mall Of Bengaluru, Thanisandra
location.address: Bhartiya Mall Of Bengaluru, Thanisandra, Bangalore

name: Deadly Dozen- SIS x Hyfit
description:
Get ready for the Deadly Dozen — a first-of-its-kind, women-only fitness experience in India. This powerful session combines circuit workouts, strength training, and explosive movements in a format that’s also beginner-friendly. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to level up your fitness game, this event is designed to push your limits while keeping you supported every step of the way.
Date: 23rd August
Time: 10:30 AM onwards
Location: HYFIT Fitness Club, HSR Layout, Bangalore
Expect a high-energy atmosphere, expert-led sessions, and a community of like-minded women coming together to train, sweat, and thrive. Don’t miss your chance to be part of this empowering movement.
